accountId.title: Account Id
accountId.description: The Account Id that owns the storefront. Required for security validation.

storefrontId.title: Storefront Id
storefrontId.description: The Storefront__c record Id to retrieve reviews for.

daysBack.title: Days Back
daysBack.description: Number of days to look back for reviews. Defaults to 30 if not provided.

reviewLimit.title: Limit
reviewLimit.description: Maximum number of reviews to retrieve. Defaults to 20 if not provided.
